titles: To the faithfull in Christ, who have stood in his council the light, to be led in the foot-steps of the flock of the companions, and to all that professe the light of Christ to be their guide: ...
author: Dewsbury, William, 1621-1688.
notes: Reproductions of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Society of Friends --  Pastoral letters and charges --  Early works to 1800.
